cause.description:
PLEASE ASSIST!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Log onto this website and sign the petition and send it to all your animal-lover friends!!
http://www.ecosystem.co.za/HuskyJustice.asp
Jono Judelman is collecting signatures to petition our legal system to prosecute Phillip Matthysen under the full penalty of the law, who cutt off a husky puppy's head with a chainsaw! Someone in SA did it yesterday to his own dog. Help me get this lunatic punished and add your signature to this petition!
1. http://www.ecosystem.co.za/HuskyJustice.asp
cause.name: Husky Killing
